Container.Name: OpenClaw
Container.Overview: OpenClaw is a powerful AI assistant gateway that connects Claude and other LLMs to messaging platforms like Discord, Telegram, WhatsApp, and more. Features include file access, shell commands, web browsing, cron jobs, and a web-based Control UI. To access the Control UI, add your token to the URL: http://YOUR-IP:18789/?token=YOUR-GATEWAY-TOKEN Documentation: https://docs.openclaw.ai
Container.PostArgs: sh -c "mkdir -p /root/.openclaw /home/linuxbrew; [ -s /root/.openclaw/openclaw.json ] || echo '{\"gateway\":{\"mode\":\"local\",\"bind\":\"lan\",\"controlUi\":{\"allowInsecureAuth\":true},\"auth\":{\"mode\":\"token\"}}}' > /root/.openclaw/openclaw.json; [ -x /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/bin/brew ] || { echo Installing Homebrew... && NONINTERACTIVE=1 curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh | bash; }; exec node dist/index.js gateway --bind lan"
Container.Description: OpenClaw is a powerful AI assistant gateway that connects Claude and other LLMs to messaging platforms like Discord, Telegram, WhatsApp, and more. Features include file access, shell commands, web browsing, cron jobs, and a web-based Control UI. To access the Control UI, add your token to the URL: http://YOUR-IP:18789/?token=YOUR-GATEWAY-TOKEN

Config.Name: Control UI Port
Config.Description: Port for Control UI and Gateway API. Access at http://IP:18789/?token=YOUR_TOKEN

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Path to store OpenClaw configuration files, sessions, and credentials

Config.Name: Workspace Path
Config.Description: Path for agent workspace (files, memory, AGENTS.md, projects)

Config.Name: Projects Path
Config.Description: Optional additional path for coding projects

Config.Name: Homebrew Path
Config.Description: Persistent storage for Homebrew packages. Enables skills that require brew/go/npm tools. First start auto-installs Homebrew (~60 seconds).

Config.Name: Gateway Token
Config.Description: Secret token for authentication. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 24 (or use any secret value). Required to access the Control UI.

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: API key for Claude models (recommended). Get from console.anthropic.com

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: API key for GPT models. Get from platform.openai.com

Config.Name: OpenRouter API Key
Config.Description: API key for OpenRouter - access 100+ models. Get from openrouter.ai

Config.Name: Gemini API Key
Config.Description: API key for Google Gemini models. Get from aistudio.google.com

Config.Name: Groq API Key
Config.Description: API key for Groq (fast Llama/Mixtral inference). Get from console.groq.com

Config.Name: Discord Bot Token
Config.Description: (Optional) Discord bot token for Discord integration. Can also configure via Control UI after install.

Config.Name: Telegram Bot Token
Config.Description: (Optional) Telegram bot token from @BotFather. Can also configure via Control UI after install.

Config.Name: Gateway Port
Config.Description: Internal gateway port. Change if 18789 is already in use (must match Control UI Port).

Config.Name: PATH
Config.Description: System PATH including Homebrew. Do not modify unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: Web Search API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Brave Search API key for web search. Free tier: 2000 queries/month at brave.com/search/api
